title: Hyundai sales up 7 pc at 63,551 units in May
description: Hyundai Motor India Ltd (HMIL) saw a 7% year-on-year rise in total sales, reaching 63,551 units in May. Domestic vehicle dispatches increased by 1% to 49,151 units, while exports surged by 31% to 14,400 units. Despite a maintenance shutdown, HMIL maintained healthy sales, with SUVs driving growth. Rural penetration stood at 20.1%.
